parameters.name: NumMultiJogLeader
parameters.description: Number of multi-jog leaders in this drawing view.

title: IView.IGetMultiJogLeaders
description: Gets all of the multi-jog leaders in this drawing view.

parameters.name: NumMultiJogLeader
parameters.description: Number of multi-jog leaders in this drawing view.

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of multi-jog leaders VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Use this method to obtain the array of multi-jog leaders all at once instead of calling
IView::GetFirstMultiJogLeader
and then repeatedly calling
IMultiJogLeader::GetNext
to obtain the remaining multi-jog leaders in the drawing view.
Before calling this method, call
IView::GetMultiJogLeaderCount
to get the value for numMultiJogLeader.
